definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Some young men even showed up at Walter's home.
sentences.chinese: 有些年轻男子甚至出现在华特家。

sentences.english: Waters keeps an eye on the trekkers and shares his tales.
sentences.chinese: 华特兹密切注意我们这群旅人的安危并分享他的故事。

sentences.english: Waterton is not far from here, just two exits down the Interstate.
sentences.chinese: 华特顿离这儿不远，就在州际公路的下两个出口。

sentences.english: Walt Disney understood that he was selling the American Dream.
sentences.chinese: 华特迪士尼了解他卖的是美国梦。
恩华特将服务于更多的人群。

sentences.english: Besides drawing, Walt had picked up a knack for acting and performing.
sentences.chinese: 除了绘画以外，华特还学会了表演技巧。

sentences.english: What do you think Sir Walter Scott was talking about?
sentences.chinese: 你认为华特史考特想表达什么？

sentences.english: I asked Walter for a few Bucks.
Walter, did you email that document to Mr. Lin yesterday?
sentences.chinese: 华特，你昨天有没有将那份文件电传给林先生？

sentences.english: Please. Becky, I'm madly in love with Walter.
sentences.chinese: 拜托，贝基，我正与华特狂恋中。

sentences.english: Huate sincerely welcome full-scale cooperation with all circles craft brother.
sentences.chinese: 华特真诚欢迎各界同仁全面合作，携手共进。

definition: Eastman (name)/George Eastman (1854-1932), US inventor and founder of Kodak 柯達|柯达[Ke1 da2]/Max F. Eastman (1883-1969), US socialist writer, subsequently severe critic of USSR
Wylie (name)/Turrell Wylie, originator of the Wylie transcription of Tibetan script
Bern or Berne, capital of Switzerland (Tw)
Gore (name)/Al Gore (1948-), US vice-president 1993-2001 under Bill Clinton, subsequently environmental campaigner and Nobel Peace laureate
Hoover (name)/Herbert Hoover (1874-1964) US mining engineer and Republican politician, president (1929-1933)
